name: ovoid
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having the same shape as an egg, or of a similar shape: The egg is ovoid and yellowish, with a thick shell. The ovoid seed pods burst when ripe.
More examplesFewer examplesHe believed that the universe was slightly ovoid.The small, ovoid fruit is purplish with a waxy bloom.Streptococcus is a spherical to ovoid bacterium which occurs in chains.

a solid object that is the same shape as an egg, or of a similar shape: A melon baller is a tool used to scoop spheres or ovoids from melons, cucumbers, or other foods.
More examplesFewer examplesThe enormous green ovoids were jackfruit.The artwork consists of pieces of stone shaped into basic geometrical solids - cubes, ovoids, hemispheres, and cylinders. It was a collection of grey-black ovoids, spheres and cylinders linked by thick struts, revolving slowly in an orbit.
